mapper.select: SELECT p.permission_id as id, p.name, p.url, p.sort, p.type, p.pid, p.code, p.color, p.icon FROM t_permission p INNER JOIN t_role_permission rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN t_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.pid ASC,p.sort ASC;
SELECT count(*) FROM t_permission WHERE pid = #{id}
SELECT p.permission_id as id, p.name, p.url, p.sort, p.type, p.pid, p.code, p.color, p.icon FROM t_permission p WHERE p.pid = #{id}
SELECT p.permission_id, p.name FROM t_permission p WHERE p.type = 1
SELECT permission_id as id FROM t_role_permission WHERE role_id = #{roleId}
